main event: Three men working in a field in Gadbjerg, near Vejle, Denmark, observed a shining object moving at high speed over the sky from southeast to northwest at about 200 meters' altitude. It remained visible for three seconds.
interesting points: The sighting took place on 7th Feb 1948 in Vejle, Denmark.
The object was observed at a high speed, moving from southeast to northwest at about 200 meters' altitude.
It remained visible for only three seconds, indicating the brief nature of the observation.
The report contains a reference to Dr. Hynek's evaluations extracted from Project Grudge report, categorizing incidents based on their probability and potential explanations.
Despite the observation, there is a note that 'No verification received of the above.'
sighted object: shining object moving at high speed
